name: AWSRedshift
description: This node reads data from Redshift using JDBC.

fields.name: url
fields.title: URL
fields.description: The JDBC URL to connect to

fields.name: dbtable
fields.title: Redshift Table
fields.description: The Redshift table that should be read. Note that anything that is valid in a FROM clause of a SQL query can be used. For example, instead of a full table you could also use a subquery in parentheses.

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names of the Table
fields.description: Output Columns Names of the Table

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types of the Table
fields.description: Output Column Types of the Table
